## EnvironmentMap.toObject() method

Returns the keys as a plain JavaScript object similar to the object returned by the `process.env` API.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toObject(): Record<string, string>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Record&lt;string, string&gt;
